name: Feed The Beast Mod 2016: Complete Installation & Preview Guide with tips
name_original: Feed The Beast Mod 2016: Complete Installation & Preview Guide with tips
description:
***FEED THE BEAST is collection of mod packs for the Minecraft.

*** FEED THE BEAST provides an easy way to play mode Minecraft without having to go through the hassle of installing each mode manually. All mods have been optimised and made compatible with each other in order to create a smooth gameplay experience.

FEED THE BEAST adds another layer of complexity to Minecraft, introducing a huge number of new items, complex game mechanics, scenic world-generation and much more to regular game.

Feed the Beast Mod contains over 1,500 mods

App will be updated regularly and more feature will be added up. Stay tuned.
